title: Bookmarks will not restore.
content: Bookmarks will not restore after a lot of troubleshooting e.g. different dated bookmarks, older versions, 32 bit version (my system is 64 bit) after I had to reinstall Win 10.
creator: burgie42

title: Can't Log into yahoo account
content:
Hi,

I need help. Firefox is blocking my mss_burr from logging into youtube. I can log in with my other account, But I need access to info on my mss_burr to gain access to my channel list. I have no issue through Google chrome.

Please help. I dont want to have to leave Firefox for chrome permanently.

MssBurr,
creator: mss_burr

title: Firefox refresh
content: How do I transfer all my bookmarks from my android phone to my laptop? I did the refresh on my laptop and lost them all.
creator: mspeedp5

title: Annoying Suggestions
content: How can I get rid of those darned suggestions that keep popping up? When an order form asks for my address and I type in the four-digit house number, Firefox pops up a suggestion which is very often WRONG! I almost entered an address with the same numbers but in a different city, which that suggestion system popped up; fortunately, I caught the error before submitting my order. For me it's this simple: I DON'T WANT THOSE DARNED SUGGESTIONS! IT'S UP TO ME TO TYPE IN THE CORRECT ENTRY ON EACH FIELD.
creator: knobman

title: Cannot import bookmarks
content: I had a reinstall of Windows 10 and a lot of my apps were not reinstalled and Firefox was one of them. When I reinstalled Firefox and opened the program there was an error message that the bookmarks and history files could not be imported because a program was using one of files. I tried all of the fixes suggested on the website and nothing works. are there any other suggestions for a fix.
creator: juliehare436

title: About opening a tab in a new tab (not new window) conveniently
content:
I found when pressing Alt+Enter in the address bar, the link will open in a new tab, which is nice. But if I press Alt+click a link in the page, the link does not open in a new tab (while Shift+click can open in a new window as expected). I'm not sure if it's a problem, but I hope Firefox can have this feature so that opening a link in a new tab can be more convenient.

Besides, in some browsers, drag a link to a nearby place will open in a new tab. However, in Firefox, this manner does not work, unless I drag a link to the tabs bar.
creator: SolidBlock

title: Disably overly insisting updates
content:
When Firefox asks if I want to download an update and I agree, soon after that but not right away it stops working - on every new page it says "we need to restart to finish updating" <- this last bit is VERY annoying. Is there a way to keep FF working in such situation? I usually have 3 FF profiles running, about 10-20 tabs each and when it suddenly does this - I can restart them all but when it is suitable for me.

The only solution I can see so far is disabling updates via group policies (which is not well documented, where do i put this policies.json on fedora? need to google that).

Any other ways to keep updates and FF running until I decide when to restart? Thanks.
creator: aikbox

title: my.yahoo weather
content:
how do I get rid of the weather overlay on my.yahoo? I know what "rain" means and don't need to see raindrops obscuring the underlying information.

thanks
creator: rhkrhk

title: Syncing to 2nd computer
content:
I am logged in to Firefox on my iMac. I added the 'master password' and wrote that down as my Firefox password, and deleted the previous password. It is only 4 characters.

I now want to sync to my Macbook Air, but it does NOT accept that password, complaining that it is only 4 characters.

How can I sync to my Macbook Air?

Thanks!
creator: netra

title: No se puede cargar este sitio redirigiendo
content: Hola, un gusto estar en contacto. Espero puedan ayudarme, cuando selecciono en el panel de control de WIX Editar Sitio para editar mi Página no me redirecciona a la página para editar me carga otra sección de WIX distinta y me sale esto 'no se puede cargar este sitio redirigiendo' y no tengo otra forma de entrar para la edición, ya Reinicie en modo seguro, Elimine cookies, Restablecí Firefox, con complementos, sin complementos, Reinstale, etc. Con Google Chrome carga bien y tengo Firefox como Navegador Predeterminado, poseo sistema operativo Windows 10 e Intel Core 3. ¡Desde ya GRACIAS!! Saludos.
creator: pensarengrande2012
